just to balance the comment made earlier, yes I agree with Rich, if the ham=
on runs off the sword would not paper unless it was an historically importa=
nt smith or blade. I have seen 1 Juyo where there is apparently no boshi. c=
ant remember who by but it was very early and by a top smith. 

Richard Tur=
ner <ikkanshi@...> wrote:          Just a curiosity, does the temp=
er run off the kissaki, if so, is this 
not a fatal flaw and not being an h=
istorically important piece, would 
not paper with any group.

Cheers

Rich=
